name: Friendly Kaiju Simulator
description:
Kaiju are responsible for more than a million flattened humans a year. But what if there were a better way? Little Jean Kaiju has a solution--don't squish people! She developed a simulation to help the more murderous members of her species safely sate their bloodlust while practicing the art of not smushing!

Can you get through the level without stepping on anyone? Or do you want to go for a macabre high score and squish as many humans as possible?

Developed by ZK and Nuyhij.

Music from Podington Bear and Vim.
